altTitles.en: ディー・エヌ・エンジェル

description.en: Daisuke Niwa is an ordinary, if slightly unlucky, middle school student. On his fourteenth birthday, he comes down with a 'condition' that has plagued the men in his family for three hundred years. When he sees his crush, Risa, he transforms into his alter ego, the phantom thief Dark Mousy. Unfortunately, when Dark Mousy sees his crush, Risa's twin Riku, he transforms back into Daisuke. The only cure for this craziness is if Daisuke can get Risa to fall in love with him…

Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

title.en: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaamama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.ja: アラサーママの私でいいの？

altTitles.zh: 三十多岁当妈的我也可以吗？

altTitles.vi: Bà mẹ đơn thân ngoài 30 như chị liệu ổn chứ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaa mama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.en: I'm around 30 is it OK with me?

altTitles.ru: С такой матерью как я, которой за 30, всё ли будет хорошо?

description.en: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
description.ru: 20 летний студент университета, говорит 32-летней матери-одиночки, что она ему нравится . Дело в том... Что он не особенно стесняется того, почему она ему нравится.
description.uk:
20-річний студент зізнався у коханні своїй 32-річній сусідці матері-одиначці. Справа в тому... Що він зовсім не *соромиться* розказувати про те, чому закоханий у неї.

[Офіційно] прохання виразити свої думки та враження від манґи у [цьому опитуванні.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform)
description.vi: Shiraishi Hanano là một người phụ nữ 32 tuổi. Một ngày nọ, cô nhận được lời tỏ tình từ người hàng xóm Yoshio-kun, một sinh viên đại học. Cậu ta khăng khăng muốn cưới cô ấy làm vợ, thậm chí không quan tâm cả việc cô ấy đã từng kết hôn hay có một đứa con gái
description.pt-br:
Uma mãe solteira de 32 anos ouve de seu vizinho, um estudante universitário de cerca de 20, que ele gosta dela. A coisa é… ele não é particularmente tímido sobre por que gosta dela.  
  
[Oficial] Por favor, responda [this survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform) para dar seus pensamentos e impressões!

altTitles.ja: ヨシダ檸檬ドロップス

description.en:
A Kyoto University student who is afraid of students vs. the most famous female wrestler at Kyoto University!?

Kyoto University is a hotbed of supernatural abilities where geniuses and prodigies from all over the country gather.

After failing the entrance exam once, Yamakawa Kashio became a student at Kyoto University, but he lost his only unique ability to study better than others, and spent his days in fear and depression as a zero-person with no unique ability.

In front of Kashio appears Sawakita Yoko, a classmate who spent three years in the mandolin club with him in high school.

Yoko, who was a plain student like Kashio, enrolled at Kyoto University while still in high school, and made a name for herself as a female wrestler, becoming the most famous Kyoto University student ever!

Kashio is overwhelmed by Yoko, who has become a distant presence, but Yoko has been waiting for Kashio to come to Kyoto University for a long time――!?
The gong of a hot love that will heat up Kamogawa is about to ring out!!

“Yup! Just as slow as I thought.”

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...
description.ja:
女子×裏格闘×団体運営＝？？？

格闘団体をクビになった天馬希望（てんまのぞみ）は一攫千金を夢見て、幼なじみの2人と女子だけの裏格闘団体を立ち上げる！しかし、興行を成功させるためスター選手として招き入れたのは、可愛らしい見た目からは想像できないとってもキケンな女子高生で…！？金か？ 夢か？ 革命か？

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill o Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.en:
It’s a rude insult when lowly and headstrong servant Edna comes to marry Duke Eli, instead of the noble daughter he expected. But the ambitious maid hides an even bigger secret behind her obvious ruse – one that could change the kingdom’s very history. Can the two find freedom, redemption – and love – without drawing their swords on each other?

---

Es un gran insulto cuando Edna, la humilde y testaruda sirvienta, se casa con el Duque Eli, en lugar de la noble hija que este esperaba. Pero la ambiciosa doncella esconde un secreto aún más grande detrás de su astucia obvia, una que podría cambiar la historia del reino. ¿Pueden los dos encontrar la libertad, la redención y el amor sin desenvainar sus espadas el uno al otro?

description.ja:
私は生き残る。何があっても… 身代わりで嫁いだ召使いの出生の秘密とは?

ウィリアム子爵邸宅の召使い「エドナ」は、子爵の娘「アナ」の身代わりに戦争で英雄となった平民出身の貴族「イーライ」と突如結婚させられることに。 
身代わりだとわかれば殺される…そんな恐怖を抱きつつイーライのもとに向かったエドナだったが、早々に嘘がバレてしまう事態に!
”私はできれば生き残りたい”そう言って『妻』だけでなく『夜の慰みもの』になるというイーライとの取引を受け入れるエドナ。 
どこか堂々とした彼女の姿に、イーライは興味を持ち始めるのだった。しかし、そんなエドナには誰にも言えない秘密があって――。

title.en: Gal to Kouhen Kichi Danshi ga Yobikou de Koisuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ギャルと高偏差値男子が予備校で恋する話

description.en:
Mashiro, a high school girl, is not very good at studying. Her grades are so bad that she has been accepted into a prep school...

She hates studying, but she can do her best if she thinks she can meet good-looking guys from other schools! At the prep school, she meets Kippei, who has a high deviation score in both face and study...?
description.ja:
成績が悪くて、親に無理やり予備校へ通わせられた茉白だったけどそこは他校のイケメンと出会える最高な場所だった☆!

勉強は嫌だけど未来の彼氏のためにおしゃれして予備校へ行く茉白は顔面＆勉強偏差値の高いきっぺーと出会って!?

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!

altTitles.ja: プラスティック・メモリーズ Say to good-bye

description.en:
A prequel manga to the TV anime "Plastic Memories", written from Michiru's perspective. Naturally, also featuring her partner, Zack!  
  
A future world in which Giftia, androids capable of feeling emotion, exist. However, Giftia have a predetermined service life of about nine years, and must be 'retrieved' when that time is up. Michiru has just joined Terminal Service, the department at SAI Corp. in charge of executing these retrievals, which can be said to mean ripping apart the relationship between Giftia and owner.

Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
Grim, a great wizard who has left behind numerous great deeds and is etched into history and memory. For the first time, he was trying to use the magic he had always used for someone else just for himself. That's right... to summon his ideal lover! A great magician in love, an incubus king who is super strong in love, an evil dragon girl who misunderstands love, and the world's most fantastic love story set in a fantasy world. The story begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67405)
description.ja:
数多の偉業を残し、歴史と記憶に刻まれた大魔法使い・グリーム。ずっと誰かのために使ってきた魔法を、彼ははじめて己のためだけに使おうとしていた。そう……理想の恋人を召喚するために!!!!!!!

恋に恋する大魔法使い、超恋愛強者のインキュバスの王、勘違いラブな邪竜少女、ファンタジーな世界を舞台に世界一ファンタジックな恋愛譚が幕を開ける！
description.es-la: Gleam es un gran mago que ha logrado grandes hazañas que quedarán grabadas en la historia. Siempre ha utilizado su magia para ayudar a los demás, pero por primera vez usará su poder para sí mismo. ¡¡Así que podría... invocar a su amante ideal!! Un gran mago en busca de amor, un rey íncubo que es súper fuerte en el amor y una dragona que no es mala, sólo una incomprendida. ¡Comienza la historia de amor más fantástica del mundo!
description.pt-br: Grim, um grande mago que deixou para trás grandes realizações e está gravado na história e na memória de todos. Pela primeira vez, ele estava tentando usar a magia que sempre usava para outra pessoa, apenas para si mesmo. Isso mesmo... para invocar sua amante ideal! Um grande mago apaixonado, um rei íncubo que é super forte no amor, uma garota dragão maligna que entende o amor erroneamente, e a história de amor mais fantástica do mundo, ambientada em um mundo de fantasia. **A história começa agora!**

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

title.en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai

altTitles.en: Only I Am Not Attacked in a World Overflowing With Zombies

altTitles.ja: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない

altTitles.en: In A World Filled With Zombies, I’m The Only One They Won’t Attack

altTitles.pt-br: Em um Mundo Cheio de Zumbis, Eu Sou o Único que Eles Não Vão Atacar

altTitles.id: Didunia yang penuh dengan Zombie hanya aku yang tidak diserang

altTitles.zh-hk: 在遍地都是喪屍的世界裡唯獨我不被襲擊

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

description.en: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
description.ru: Касанэ Сибата работает графическим дизайнером в компании, выпускающей детские игрушки. Однажды она случайно... дотронулась до ягодиц своего коллеги, Субару Энокиды, и это напомнило ей о любимом персонаже из детства. Касанэ хочет извиниться перед Субару, не подозревая, что он скрывает...

title.en: The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning

altTitles.zh: 末日狠人：开局囤积万亿物资

altTitles.zh-hk: 末日狠人：開局囤積萬億物資

altTitles.zh-ro: Mò Rì Hěn Rén: Kāijú Túnjī Wàn Yì Wùzī
Mo Ri Hen Ren: Kaiju Tunji Wan Yi Wuzi

altTitles.en: Stockpiling in Apocalypse The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning
The Last All-Knowing Man Collected Trillions of Stuff from Day One

description.en: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title.en: The Kitten I Picked Up Turned Out to Be Bigger than I Expected

altTitles.ja: 拾った子猫が思っていたより大きくなった

altTitles.ja-ro: Hirotta Koneko ga Omotteita Yori Ookikunatta

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

title.en: Kaji daikou no arubaito wo hajimetara gakuen ichi no bishoujo no kazoku ni kiniirarechaimashita.

altTitles.en: I Started working a Housekeeping Job and Ended Up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School.

altTitles.ja: 家事代行のアルバイトを始めたら学園一の美少女の家族に気に入られちゃいました。

description.en:
My Part-Time Job is at the House of the Cutest Girl in School. A Shy and Awkward Housekeeping Rom-Com with the School Idol!

During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!

title.en: The Girl Who Can Read The Mind of The One Sitting Next to Her

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の子の妄想が見える百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Ko no Mousou ga Mieru Yuri Manga

altTitles.id: Si Gadis yang Bisa Membaca Pikirian dari Orang Disampingnya

description.en:
In the middle Heian period, a small island called Onishima is isolated from civilization.
As a young girl, Torago was playing with her sister, Tana, when she disappears into the sea unexpectedly.
However, it wasn't Torago's fault, but the fault of another boy who was playing with them.
Torago and that boy grew up with guilt, and later ended up together, but one day a woman who looks like “Tana” appears in Onishima...
description.es:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.
De niña, Torago estaba jugando junto al mar con su hermana, Tana, cuando esta desapareció por causas ajenas a su voluntad.
Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...
description.ja:
平安時代中頃、文明から隔離された小さな島「鬼島」。
トラゴは幼少時代、実姉「タナ姉え」と海辺で遊んでいるとき、自分のせいで「タナ姉え」を行方不明にしてしまう。
だが、それはトラゴの過失ではなく、一緒に遊んでいたもう一人の少年の過失だった。
トラゴと少年は共に罪悪感にさいなまれながら成長し、後に結婚するが、ある日「タナ姉え」に似た女が鬼島に漂流してきた…。
description.es-la:

Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma
The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

description.en: The fun and marvelous daily life of a young couple after meeting mysterious children who found their way to them.
description.ko:
숲속의 젊은 부부와 어느 날 그들에게 찾아온
정체불명의 아이들이 만들어가는 즐겁고 신묘한 일상
description.zh:
渴望拥有孩子的年轻夫妇，
突降长着老虎耳朵的萌娃！
很久以前在一座村庄里，从小青梅竹马的他们长大后顺理成章结为了夫妇。但结婚多年却一直没有孩子，尝试了各种“良药”后无果，最终找到了隔壁村传闻很厉害的神算子告诉他们需要搬家到山林里。某天突然家里出来了两个来历不明的小孩！好像还长着老虎的耳朵和尾巴？！

title.en: Amateur E-girl Streaming a Space War

altTitles.ja-ro: Teihen Chūbā ga Uchū Sensō o Totte Mita
Teihen Tuber ga Uchuu Sensou wo Tottemita

altTitles.ja: 底辺チューバーが宇宙戦争を撮ってみた

description.en:
On a day just like any other, a giant spaceship suddenly appeared and invaded Earth, obliterating entire cities in the blink of an eye. In the midst of the attacks, Kanna Fujimiya, amateur content creator, rose to fame overnight with her video coverage of the invasion. With her newfound popularity and charms, Kanna continues to cover the war from the front lines, but…!?  
  
This amateur content creator reveals the truth behind the interstellar war in this science fiction thriller!

altTitles.ja: アフタースクールメイト

description.en: Family, friends, himself... Rika is frustrated by his inability to gain understanding of the gender difference between his body and mind, and one day he gets into a fight with his mother and runs away from home. There he meets Satsuki, a boy who can share his feelings of not being understood... The two meet and confront the issues they have been running away from... A coming-of-age drama that questions "individuality"!

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: #Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachide wa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: #クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

description.en: In this suspense action story, junior high school student Kudou Gai is framed for the murder of an elderly wealthy man Hirata Ryuuhou, and fights to prove his innocence and escape from the horrific rehabilitation facility called the Human Academy.

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

title.en: Game-nai Saikyou no "Ura Boss" ni Tensei shita no de, Shujinkou no Kawarini Saisoku Clear wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので､主人公の代わりに最速クリアを目指します!

description.en:
Reincarnated as a secret boss!? I'm going to repeat a grade!

One day, I, a retired gamer, was reincarnated as the secret boss of a game I was playing. I aim to clear the game as quickly as possible in order to return to the real world, but... nothing goes as planned! ?

Where is the main character of the game? ?
Mob NPC has become a hero! ?
The villainess ended up in my party! ?
description.ja:
「裏ボスに転生！？俺、留年しちまうぞぉおおおお！！」

廃人ゲーマーの俺は、ある日やり込んでいたゲームの裏ボスに転生してしまった。現実世界への帰還のために最速クリアを目指すが…何一つ思い通りにいかない！？

ゲームの主人公はどこ！？
モブNPCが勇者になってしまった！？
悪役令嬢が俺のパーティーになってしまったんですけど！？

title.en: I Have a Set of Passive Skills

altTitles.en: I Have a Body Full of Passive Skills

description.en:
“Is the strongest skill in the world a skill that needs to be actively used?”

“Wrong! It’s a passive skill!”

“What is a passive skill?”

“A passive skill is an instant-activated active skill, a killing move that no one will be prepared for, the ultimate trump card that only the dead can know!”

“Can you explain it in simpler terms?” 

“Breathing techniques, strength, perception…” 

“Heh, is that it?”

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: A Story About a Salaryman Who Goes to Another World and Becomes One of the Four Heavenly Kings

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

altTitles.ru: Из корпоративного раба в приспешники демона

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become “Big Four” in the Different World.

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: A tsundere cool guy × A naturally charming little cutie! The adorable little sweet dream deity, who came to the human world to gain experience, discovers that his "mischievous" new partner is actually his fated mate!

There is a Gothic-style mansion in a distant, rarely-visited part of Japan. There, the world's greatest surgeon, Naomitsu Madaraki, once lived but he hasn't come home in ages.  
  
Instead, the professor's "daughter," Fran Madaraki, lives there with a large amount of her own ghoulish creations and her "younger sister" Veronica. She's a very unusual girl, what with the stitch patterns on her face and the giant bolts on either side of her head. Just as skilled at surgery as her father, and if you're willing to pay her price, she can do everything up to and including raising the dead. Fran believes that a life should be saved no matter the cost, and keep that in mind, since the results of her surgeries are rarely (if ever) pretty.  
  
  
Fran can make anyone into anything, raise the dead, switch heads and bodies, and give you those eyes that you've always wanted. But do you actually want them? Is it a good thing to raise the dead? Do the ends justify the means? And does Fran care?
description.pt-br: Fran pode transformar qualquer um em qualquer coisa, ressuscitar os mortos, trocar cabeças e corpos, e te dar aquele visual que você sempre quis. Mas você quer mesmo isso? É seguro acordar os mortos? Os fins justificam os meios? A Fran liga pra isso?

description.en: Sugoi Ten Fes is focused on the N-rarity members who topped the popularity poll: Shizuku Ōsaka, Kanata Konoe, and Emma Verde

altTitles.en: As If See the Snow Comes
As If You See the Snow Comes

description.en: Su Ruhui, a Class A wanted criminal of the Secret Sect, died tragically after falling seriously ill. When he woke up, he found that it was five years later and he had become the newlywed husband of the Secret Sect's first disciple Sang Chiyu, Shi Jiang Quexie. Sang Chiyu was Su Ruhui's mortal enemy and the most prestigious military officer of the Kunlun Secret Sect. The former favored child of heaven, for some unknown reason, had his right leg crippled and was covered with whip wounds, barely surviving.

title.en: Wan Gu Shen WangImmortal God King

description.en: The past life died because of the imperial concubine, and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager, he will follow the path of his journey, and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay, he will push him all the way.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir.
